fields.description:
Verification Conditions:
* Go through Cards section (rows 5-9) on the [gap list spreadsheet|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-9mxUaea36VE0IjTmizbmUNi_30o7lUOZzwcMQDsAWw/]
* Review the Angular Implementation and the Design in PF
* Update the spreadsheet indicating if the designs match
* If designs do not match, create a Design Gap Details doc using this [template|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FlISNzU5fQ0kNCjRZQY_LMP6AT_D0Dc0KpqbbyvKznA/edit#heading=h.nnqmf5wzse2] and link it to the above spreadsheet

items.fromString:
Verification Conditions:
* Add rows for each design pattern in Cards to the spreadsheet https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-9mxUaea36VE0IjTmizbmUNi_30o7lUOZzwcMQDsAWw/
* Note if Angular Code Exists for the pattern (Use: https://rawgit.com/dtaylor113/angular-patternfly/list-card-view-pagination-ngdocs/docs/index.html#/api)
* Note if the Angular Code is linked on the PF Site
* *** DO NOT verify if design matches yet - that will be done in a different story

renderedFields.description:
Verification Conditions:

  • Go through Cards section (rows 5-9) on the gap list spreadsheet
  • Review the Angular Implementation and the Design in PF
  • Update the spreadsheet indicating if the designs match
  • If designs do not match, create a Design Gap Details doc using this template and link it to the above spreadsheet

items.toString:
Need to create alternative "On" and "Paused" icons. These will be inserted into the Google Form icon survey that Sara is creating, to get votes on icon preference.

* Design new icons
* Give finished icon PNGs to [~schizari] for User Testing
items.fromString:
Need to create alternative "On" and "Paused" icons for both status and action instances. These will be inserted into the Google Form icon survey that Sara is creating, to get votes on icon preference.

* Design new icons
* Give finished icon PNGs to [~schizari] for User Testing

fields.summary: Add Single Sign On (SSO) templates to new login options

status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.
status.name: In Progress

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Previous work was done to create wireframe level designs for new login page templates that will satisfy a variety of use cases beyond simple login. These are summarized here: https://redhat.invisionapp.com/share/59DNSUUZT#/255230613_1

Need to add one additional use case to this for single sign-on. This will allow a user to sign on once and access multiple applications within the same organization.  Should research existing approaches to this and add the additional design template.

Verification Conditions:
* Design is added to the InVision deck and reviewed with [~mcarrano], [~lhinson], and relevant stakeholders from the KeyCloak team.

header.title: Export this issue in another format
header.label: Export

renderedFields.description:
Previous work was done to create wireframe level designs for new login page templates that will satisfy a variety of use cases beyond simple login. These are summarized here: https://redhat.invisionapp.com/share/59DNSUUZT#/255230613_1

Need to add one additional use case to this for single sign-on. This will allow a user to sign on once and access multiple applications within the same organization. Should research existing approaches to this and add the additional design template.

Verification Conditions:

  • Design is added to the InVision deck and reviewed with Matt Carrano, Leslie Hinson, and relevant stakeholders from the KeyCloak team.

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a user
I want to view Executive Summary metrics
so that I can view a richer summary of my Insights usage.

BACKGROUND
The Insights team asked to include the metrics that are shown in the Executive Summary into the Dashboard:
 !tmp2.png|thumbnail! 
 !image.png|thumbnail! 
These metrics should match the look and feel of the existing Red Hat Dashboard. 

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA
Updated wireframe with new metrics in the Insights band

fields.summary: Take a visual look at subcategory styling in the OpenShift catalog

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Take a look at the subcategory styling in OpenShift. The unselected subcategories look disabled, and we need a better tie between the selected subcategory and the results.

[https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/issues/2454 |https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/issues/2454]

* Design a high-fidelity solution that addresses the hierarchy issues in catalog subcategories.
* review with [~sdoyle][~cbritt][~chart][~cshinn]
* Post to the github issue (link above), for devs to review and implement

header.title: Export this issue in another format
header.label: Export

renderedFields.description:
Take a look at the subcategory styling in OpenShift. The unselected subcategories look disabled, and we need a better tie between the selected subcategory and the results.

https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/issues/2454

  • Design a high-fidelity solution that addresses the hierarchy issues in catalog subcategories.
  • review with Serena DoyleCameron BrittColleen HartChris Shinn
  • Post to the github issue (link above), for devs to review and implement
